show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 1
synopsis: Before Lore can run risky experiments on Geordi, Troi and Picard, the three seek a way to re-boot Data's ethical program that Lore switched off to pull Data to his side.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 2
synopsis: On a diplomatic mission, Worf, Troi and the Captain deal with three aliens who explore foreign concepts with extreme, singular focus.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 3
synopsis: Geordi is distracted by the news of the possible loss of his mother while he uses a new remote probe technology to search for a downed spacecraft.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 4
synopsis: While investigating the apparent death of Capt. Picard, Riker is abducted by a group of intergalactic archaeological thieves, only to find Picard has apparently joined their ranks.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 5
synopsis: Riker and Picard must find out why this intergalactic gang is looting archaeological sites.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 6
synopsis: Data deals with his new ability to experience nightmares as the Enterprise deals with the installation of a new warp core that won't work as expected.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 7
synopsis: While establishing diplomatic relations with an alien race called the Cairn, Deanna's mother experiences a mental breakdown and falls into a coma, and it seems like Deanna is the only one who is able to help her, even if her mother doesn't want it.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 8
synopsis: Captain Picard & Dr. Crusher discover things about one another when they are captured by a opposing alien race, due to the fact that the Enterprise has come to allow the planet's other civilization the choice of being part of the Federation.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 9
synopsis: While searching for a missing Federation medical transport, the Enterprise is accosted by two scientists from a nearby planet who claim that cumulative exposure to warp energy is weakening the fabric of space.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 10
synopsis: On Federation planet Atrea IV, Data encounters the former wife of his creator Noonian Soong who claims to be his "mother".

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 11
synopsis: On his return from a bat'leth competition in the Klingon Empire, Worf finds himself shifting realities where events and details are in a constant state of flux and only he is aware of the changes.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 12
synopsis: Riker finds out his former commander from the starship Pegasus has orders that entail more than what is revealed to Picard, who thinks the Enterprise is en route to recover the lost ship. And Riker is ordered to secrecy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 13
synopsis: In an attempt to preserve a race of people on a planet being bombarded by storms that would kill them, Worf's foster brother violates the Prime Directive, leaving the Enterprise crew in a difficult position.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 14
synopsis: Dr. Crusher meets the man in her dead grandmother's life when she tries to put her affairs in order, whom one of the local people warn her to stay away from by not lighting a candle that has been lit for generations.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 15
synopsis: A mission of the Enterprise as seen through some junior officers who are up for promotions, as questions of duty and honor arise among some of them, such as a Bajoran whom Worf has designated to be promoted to operations.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 16
synopsis: Data is sent to follow a probe that has drifted off course and crashed on a primitive planet, only to crash on the planet, himself, with no memory of any event prior to crashing on the planet's surface.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 17
synopsis: Investigating a rogue comet that's been traveling throughout the universe for over 87 million years, Picard discovers alien beings within the comet, which infest the computer systems on the Enterprise, as well as Data.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 18
synopsis: As a young lieutenant aboard the Enterprise commits suicide, his ship mates deal with the loss and Deanna deals with feelings surrounding her as she and Worf begin to form a relationship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 19
synopsis: When a new torpedo guidance system malfunctions, Picard and Data go chasing after it into an asteroid field, while the crew is left behind to deal with their own strange behaviors.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 20
synopsis: After the Federation grants access by the Cardassians to a planet already inhabited by Native American Indians, Picard has the daunting task of relocating them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 21
synopsis: In an effort to help him accept his Klingon heritage, Worf and his son, Alexander, attend an ancient Klingon ceremony.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 22
synopsis: Picard races the Ferengi in an effort to track down the son he never knew he had.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 23
synopsis: Strange images begin appearing throughout the ship's decks and holodecks. Data and the rest of the crew begin to investigate only to discover that the ship's computer itself is exhibiting the strange behavior as it begins to become self-aware.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 24
synopsis: Following her return from Advanced Tactical Training, Bajoran Ro Laren is sent to infiltrate the Maquis and finds herself torn between her loyalty to Picard and Starfleet, and her sympathy with the Maquis fighting "the good fight".

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 7 - 25
synopsis: Capt. Picard finds himself shifting continually into the past, future and present and must use that to discover a threat to humanity's existence.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 1
synopsis: On the maiden mission of the U.S.S. Enterprise (NCC-1701-D), an omnipotent being known as Q challenges the crew to discover the secret of a mysterious base in an advanced and civilized fashion.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 2
synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise is infected with a virus that causes them to behave as though they were intoxicated.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 3
synopsis: When the leader of an alien culture takes a romantic interest in Lt. Yar, he claims her for his own, to the dismay of his own wife, who, in turn, challenges Tasha in a fight to the death.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 4
synopsis: The Enterprise makes a confrontational first contact with the piratical Ferengi race as their two ships are ensnared by a presumed dead planet ready to judge them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 5
ep_title: Where No One Has Gone Before
synopsis: Everyone accurately pegs a visiting propulsion scientist as a charlatan, but only Wesley Crusher recognizes his alien assistant as the real deal.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 6
synopsis: While distracted by two antithetical races applying for Federation membership, the Enterprise picks up a sentient entity that can alternately possess either man or machinery.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 7
synopsis: On an alien planet, young Wesley Crusher commits a transgression - small by our standards but mandatorily punishable by death in theirs.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 8
synopsis: Beware Ferengi bearing gifts. Capt. Picard receives the Stargazer, a ship considered lost that he once commanded.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 9
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters Q again, and he tempts Riker by endowing him with the powers of the Q.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 10
synopsis: While on a mission to a planet called Haven, Counselor Troi meets her husband to be, a marriage arranged by her father years before, as the Enterprise encounters a ship far deadlier than any combat could provide.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 11
synopsis: Captain Picard and some of his crew are caught in a deadly trap in the holodeck as the result of a ship-wide scan from an alien race.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 12
synopsis: The Enterprise visits the planet where Data was created and discovers another android like him, but when he's assembled, he's not EXACTLY like him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 13
synopsis: Riker, Troi, Data and Yar beam down to a planet ruled by a matriarchal government in the hopes of locating a missing freighter crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 14
synopsis: The Enterprise docks at a starbase for repairs where it is commandeered by a race of technologically-linked aliens intent on using the vessel for their own purposes.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 15
synopsis: The Enterprise transports an elderly Starfleet Admiral to negotiate a hostage crisis. When the Admiral takes a de-aging drug, he endangers both his life and the mission.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 16
synopsis: A planet that was able to cloak itself for thousands of years suddenly reveals itself, with its inhabitants proposing peace. But, after initial negotiations, children of the Enterprise are kidnapped due to the infertility of the inhabitants.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 17
synopsis: On Velara III, Geordi and Data discover a microscopic life form responsible for the death of an engineer stationed on the base.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 18
synopsis: Picard finds himself facing a strenuous test of his loyalty to Starfleet, one which the other members of the crew are struggling to cope with, whilst Wesley faces an equally challenging entrance exam at Starfleet Academy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 19
synopsis: The Enterprise searches for answers as to why three Klingon warriors were the only survivors aboard a freighter just inside the Neutral Zone which was seemingly attacked by a Ferengi ship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 20
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a planet long dead, but technical equipment still functions for the purpose of selling off its arsenal, along with self sufficiency.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 21
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters two neighboring cultures, one suffering from a plague, the other marketing a cure, and learns that nothing is as simple as it seems.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 22
synopsis: Counselor Troi is held captive on a deserted planet by a slick, black, oily, sentient and immortal puddle of evil.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 23
synopsis: A scientist's experiment in time goes awry, reuniting Picard with an old flame, now married to the scientist.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 24
synopsis: After diverting to a secret meeting with an old friend and some of Starfleet's finest commanders, Picard finds the Horatio blown to bits just hours after the meeting and he returns the Enterprise to Earth looking for answers.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 1 - 25
synopsis: While assigned to investigate missing outposts in the Neutral Zone, the Enterprise revives three cryogenically frozen people found aboard a wayward derelict Earth vessel.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 1
synopsis: Deanna is impregnated by a unknown alien life-form, and Dr. Katherine Pulaski joins the Enterprise as the ship's new Chief Medical Officer.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 2
synopsis: The Enterprise encounters a mysterious void in space and when they move in closer to investigate further, it envelops them and they can't get out.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 3
synopsis: An attempt to provide Data with a challenging Sherlock Holmes holodeck RPG scenario backfires when its Prof. Moriarty character accidentally becomes self-aware.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 4
synopsis: The Enterprise rescues the captain of a broken-down freighter, only to become involved in a dispute between feuding worlds--each demanding custody of their guest. Data seeks help from Guinan in understanding humor.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 5
synopsis: The crew ferries a deaf mediator to Solais V to negotiate an end to a civil war.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 6
synopsis: A dying anti-social scientist unintentionally comes upon the perfect vessel in which to preserve his intellect and arrogant personality - Data.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 7
synopsis: Enhanced DNA developments trigger an epidemic of rapid aging. Caught among its victims - Dr. Pulaski.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 8
synopsis: Under an Officers Exchange Program, Riker serves aboard a Klingon ship, whose aging captain seeks an unwarranted bloody retaliation for suspected Enterprise treachery.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 9
synopsis: When Data resigns his commission rather than be dismantled for examination by an inadequately skilled scientist, a formal hearing is convened to determine whether Data is considered property without rights or is a sentient being.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 10
synopsis: Wesley falls for the young future leader of Daled IV, unaware just how dangerous the girl's protective and overly restrictive guardian can be.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 11
synopsis: Encountering the superior technology of a very ancient race creates system malfunctions for a doomed Federation starship, for the Enterprise, and for an eavesdropping Romulan warbird.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 12
synopsis: Worf, Data and Riker find themselves trapped in a recreation of a poorly written novel.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 13
synopsis: The Enterprise comes across its own shuttlecraft adrift in space - a duplicate - with an unconscious duplicate Capt. Picard inside.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 14
synopsis: Riker's delight at being offered a command of the USS Aries turns to frustration when the man sent to prepare him for his mission is his estranged father; Worf's behavior leads Wesley to delve into Klingon tradition.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 15
synopsis: Data befriends an alien girl in distress, breaking the Prime Directive, while Wesley commands his first team.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 16
synopsis: Q tries to prove that Picard needs him as part of their crew by hurling the Enterprise 7,000 light years away where they encounter the Borg for the first time.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 17
synopsis: With Picard away for routine surgery, the Enterprise responds to an apparent distress call from a Pakled vessel.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 18
synopsis: An antiqued distress signal leads to two lost 22nd century Earth colonies, each facing doom in different ways, one by fire, the other by prolonged cloning.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 19
synopsis: A midlife Betazoid condition renders Ambassador Troi hot on the hunt for romance and wedlock with Captain Picard - or any man.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 20
synopsis: The Enterprise addresses the emergency of an old Klingon ship coming out of stasis and ready to fight the Federation. A half-Human/half Klingon emissary arrives to help, who once knew Worf intimately.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 21
synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise participates in war games.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 2 - 22
synopsis: When Commander Riker comes down with a dangerous alien infection after an away mission, the only way to treat it may be through reliving his memories.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 1
synopsis: Wesley's latest science project escapes the lab, threatening the Enterprise and an eminent scientist's life-long project.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 2
synopsis: After 111 years of silence, an extremely litigious alien race asserts its agreed upon right to wipe out a Federation colony in its territory.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 3
synopsis: The Enterprise responds to a distress call from Rana IV, a Federation colony that is under attack from an unknown alien ship. When they arrive, they find the entire surface of the planet destroyed, save for a single house and two occupants.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 4
synopsis: A proto-Vulcan culture worships Captain Picard and prepares to offer Counselor Troi as a sacrifice.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 5
synopsis: A startling surprise awaits the crew of the Enterprise when a mission costs the life of a crew member, who left her son behind.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 6
synopsis: The Enterprise triggers an ancient yet effective trap left by an extinct race, with a perfectly preserved derelict ship serving as cheese for Picard.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 7
synopsis: LaForge gets left behind on a storm-plagued planet when the rest of his team encounters a Romulan warrior.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 8
synopsis: While the Enterprise hosts negotiations for control of a stable wormhole, Troi forms a personal relationship with an opposing negotiator, unaware of his true being.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 9
synopsis: The Enterprise pursues a race of "gatherers" who continue to raid Federation outposts, unaware of the dangers lurking among them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 10
synopsis: When a Romulan officer defects to the Federation with a warning of a impending invasion, Capt. Picard struggles to decide if he is to be believed.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 11
synopsis: Investigating a planet applying for membership into the Federation, the crew of the Enterprise finds a group of inhabitants who used to be soldiers, but now fight for their very existence.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 12
synopsis: While visiting a planet under civil war, Dr. Crusher is taken hostage by an opposing faction of the planet's ruling government.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 13
synopsis: Much to Picard's displeasure, Q reappears on the Enterprise, claiming to have been ejected from the Q Continuum, and therefore, lost his powers.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 14
synopsis: The widow of respected scientist Dr. Nel Apgar accuses Riker of seducing her and killing her husband. Rather than turn Riker over for unfavorable trial, the Enterprise reconstructs the facts.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 15
synopsis: The Enterprise C enters the Enterprise D's time and space continuum, where they find Picard and crew in a constant state of war with the Klingons, and only Guinan knows it.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 16
synopsis: After returning from a cybernetics conference to the Enterprise, Data creates his own "child," much to the chagrin of his captain, and without regards to the ramifications with Starfleet.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 17
synopsis: A Klingon commander comes aboard the Enterprise in an officer exchange program initiated by Starfleet, much to the chagrin of the crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 18
synopsis: Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens and meanwhile replaced with a replica as impostor captain.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 19
synopsis: After mediating a difficult trade agreement, Captain Picard is encouraged to take a much needed rest on a vacationing planet, where he's visited by a strange race from the future, in search of a dangerous weapon.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 20
synopsis: The Enterprise reaches out to an alien being, while dancing around with the Romulans, who want to attack it in an act of vengeance.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 21
synopsis: A shy member of the "Enterprise" crew becomes addicted to the holodeck, where relationships are easier than in real life, when his knowledge is needed in engineering.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 22
synopsis: When transporting a dangerous material to the Enterprise, Data is kidnapped and the crew is led to believe he is dead when the shuttlecraft he was piloting explodes enroute.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 23
synopsis: Legendary Federation ambassador Sarek visits the Enterprise to conclude peace talks with a race called the Legarans. His arrival is accompanied with a rash of unusual emotional outbursts among the crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 24
synopsis: When Deanna's mother spurns advances made by a Ferengi Daimon, he takes it upon himself to kidnap the two of them, along with Commander Riker and steal them away aboard his ship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 25
synopsis: The Enterprise finds a deserted planet where a ship has crashed, and, with it, the lone survivor with no memory, but extraordinary healing powers.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 3 - 26
synopsis: Responding to a distress call on one of the Federation's outer-most colonies, the Enterprise arrives...only to find a big hole in the ground where the town used to be, and discovers the Borg are behind the attack.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 1
ep_title: The Best of Both Worlds: Part II
synopsis: Having absorbed Captain Picard and his knowledge, the Borg head for Earth, leaving Riker and the Enterprise desperate for an unanticipated way to defeat them.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 2
synopsis: After defeating the Borg, the crew of the Enterprise experiences shore leave in various ways. Captain Picard's return to his family's vineyard in France has some extraordinary repercussions.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 3
synopsis: After an accident aboard the Enterprise leaves one of its children in grave danger, Data commandeers the Enterprise, driven to take the ship to an unknown origin, where an interesting figure awaits.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 4
synopsis: On a rescue mission to an alien shipwrecked training mission, they discover one of its trainees to be a human.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 5
synopsis: Dr. Crusher's fear of losing loved ones becomes real when her worries create an alternate reality.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 6
synopsis: The crew of the Enterprise enters into orbit around the home planet of their former crew-mate, Tasha Yar, where they encounter her sister.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 7
synopsis: When the leader of the Klingon High Council passes on, Picard finds himself in the middle of the struggle for the now-vacant position. Meanwhile, Worf reunites with a past love, only to find he now has a son.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 8
synopsis: "Captain" Riker awakens sixteen years after an away mission where he contracted a retro-virus that has destroyed his memory back to the point of infection - or so he is told.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 9
synopsis: Before leaving for Starfleet Academy, Wesley Crusher accompanies Captain Picard on a dangerous mission.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 10
synopsis: As an unknown force drags the Enterprise, Deanna Troi struggles with the loss of her powers.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 11
synopsis: Data tries to comprehend the complex emotions between O'Brien and Keiko, who are about to be married.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 12
synopsis: After being fired upon by a Cardassian vessel, Picard races against time to find out the facts behind the Cardassian commander's claim that the Federation attacked one of their outposts.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 13
synopsis: While answering a distress call, Picard finds himself not sure of exactly who he is dealing with, but he's sure he's not dealing with the planet's version of the Devil, as she claims to be.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 14
synopsis: Effects of passing through a wormhole give the Enterprise crew a sense that they were unconscious for more than the thirty seconds they've been led to believe.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 15
synopsis: Disguised as an alien prior to First Contact, Will's life becomes imperiled when incurred injuries reveal his foreign internal structure to a xenophobic alien population.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 16
synopsis: As Geordi La Forge finally meets the real Dr. Leah Brahms, a tragic first contact leaves the Enterprise with a gigantic galactic infant suckling the ship's energy.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 17
synopsis: The Enterprise gets trapped in a Tyken's Rift, an energy-absorbing rupture in space, where all but Data, Troi and Guinan experience rising hallucinations and paranoia.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 18
synopsis: Lt. Commander Geordi La Forge and an old friend fight to defeat a parasite that is trying to transform them into another species.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 19
synopsis: When assigned to investigate an unknown probe, Lt. Barclay is electrocuted through a shuttlecraft's computer, where he receives an unexplainable boost of confidence and a vast increase in his knowledge.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 20
synopsis: Aiming to get out of Jean-Luc's debt, Q forces Capt. Picard and his officers to live out the Legend of Robin Hood - with a past acquaintance as Maid Marian.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 21
synopsis: A retired admiral boards the Enterprise in an effort to determine the actions aboard the ship surrounding an act of sabotage and possible treason.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 22
synopsis: Counselor Troi's mother visits the Enterprise and becomes infatuated with a man whose culture forces him into a suicidal ritual called "The Resolution."

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 23
synopsis: Dr. Crusher falls for someone who's not at all what she expects him to be.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 24
synopsis: Geordi is brainwashed by the Romulans to assassinate a Klingon governor.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 25
synopsis: When a female crew member is infatuated with Lieutenant Commander Data, he decides to give a romantic relationship a try. Also, the Enterprise finds itself having to maneuver through a dangerous nebula.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 4 - 26
synopsis: Both Captain Picard and Lt. Worf must decide where their priorities lie as the Klingon Empire descends into a bitter civil war.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 1
synopsis: As Worf fights in the Klingon Civil War, Captain Picard and his crew must stop the Romulans from helping their pawns achieve victory.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 2
synopsis: Picard must learn to communicate with a race that speaks in metaphor under a difficult set of circumstances.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 3
synopsis: Captain Picard foils a plot against the Bajorans with his new Bajoran officer, Ensign Ro.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 4
synopsis: The Crystalline Entity returns, and the Enterprise takes aboard a scientist to help track it down, but her personal agenda does not match Capt. Picard's.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 5
synopsis: Collision with a quantum filament leaves Troi in charge of a damaged and endangered Enterprise with emergency bulkheads cutting off sections of the ship.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 6
synopsis: Wesley Crusher returns to the Enterprise on vacation from the Academy only to discover a mysterious alien game infiltrating and controlling the crew.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 7
synopsis: Picard and Data follow Spock into Romulan space on a dangerous mission.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 8
synopsis: On Romulus, Picard finds Spock, as well as an underground peace movement, a double agent, a bold ulterior motive against the Federation, and a familiar foe.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 9
synopsis: Reaching Panthara IV after an asteroid wreaks havoc of catastrophic proportions, the Enterprise crew deals with trying to save the planet as well as deal with someone who claims to be a historian from the future.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 10
synopsis: Geordi can barely curtail his enthusiasm at being able to test out a new theory of transportation, as Worf's mother boards the Enterprise with his son and news that Worf's Earthly parents can no longer care for him.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 11
synopsis: Data rescues an orphaned boy named Timothy from a damaged ship. As a way to repress his own pain, Timothy begins to mimic Data's personality.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 12
synopsis: Transporting three Ullian mind-probing historians, the Enterprise crew is stymied when some of its members fall into a coma. Deanna Troi, the first crew member to come through it, cannot recall anything surrounding the incident.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 13
synopsis: Working together to prevent the annihilation of a perfectly balanced, isolated society (with no contingency for outside visitors) may, in fact, destroy it.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 14
synopsis: When an approaching alien ship wipes their memory, the crew struggles to put back together what happened.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 15
synopsis: A long-lost ship is found on a planet where cosmic storms prevented detection for 200 years. When a surface landing goes wrong, the away team is beamed back...with a few extra surprises.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 16
synopsis: After an accident that leaves him no longer able to walk, Worf asks Riker to help him commit suicide.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 17
synopsis: While aiding an androgynous race who lost a couple of members in an unmapped region of space, Riker falls for one of them, which can lead to trouble if detected, since the alien race does not endorse gender specificity.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 18
synopsis: The Enterprise gets caught in a time loop which always has one result: total destruction of the ship, itself.

show_sea_ep: Star Trek: The Next Generation - Season 5 - 19
